name: Boon Seng Curry Rice (文成咖喱飯)

reviews.text:
This is comfort food at its best. I usually order a $4.50 set with turmeric briyani rice (more curcumin with anti-inflammatory properties and low GI with high amylose:amylopectin ratio; what's there not to love?), onion egg, chicken chop and veg.

The onion egg is quite fragrant. The curry is gloopy and generously slathered on the rice - I mean, just look at how it clings onto the rice! For the veg, I recommend the potatoes which have a nice roasted taste (although I'm sure they're not!).

It's a one-man show with Uncle cooking and serving the food all by himself. Thank you uncle for keeping us satiated and happy!

Hidden gem right here.
Chinese uncle cooking up legit mutton briyani.

$6 super nice mutton briyani at Jalan Batu hawker centre. It comes with briyani rice, mutton, a veg of your choice and either onion egg or fried egg.
Rice is very fragrant, mutton is soft and tender. I chose eggplant and onion egg and totally enjoyed it.
Great value delicious curry rice. Chinese cooked Briyani set too. Price is very reasonable. Curry is cook well. Food variety is wide spreading too.

(2024 update)
Curry’s so good, even Indian FW eats here
Curry’s so fresh, forget about keeping it
Pricey so decent, where to find so good value

Surprised to stumble on nondescript stall here
one of the most sedap local chicken curries
no surprise even foreign indian workers
fork out to eat their mutton briyanis
everyday same layered standards
potatoes soft, onions turn sweet
brinjals and beans done right
all stew over long and soft
join the queue for a feast
delight
Really good curry chicken  and onion egg. $5 for their set menu. Hidden gem, worth coming here for a try
